backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining surgery case management system with types (Species, Sex, Checklist, SurgeryCase, UserProfile), CRUD operations for cases and user profiles, and role-based access control using MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a fix for the parseStructuredText function to correctly extract and parse Date of Birth fields from structured text input, supporting multiple date formats and label variations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React files including components for authentication, case management, CSV import/export, date parsing, validation, search, and UI theming with forced light mode.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements like background, foreground, primary, secondary, borders, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with light color scheme enforcement, Surgery Case Log title, favicon links, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow with Internet Identity, profile setup modal for new users, case list view for authenticated users, forced light theme via ThemeProvider, and MutationObserver to prevent dark mode.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login/logout button component using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout and handling for authentication state transitions.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup that prompts for name input and saves to backend using useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Checklist configuration defining seven items (Discharge Notes, pDVM Notified, Labs, Histo, Surgery Report, Imaging, Culture) with default states and utility functions for default checklist and remaining items.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Displays a surgery case as a card with patient details, checklist tasks, and actions (edit, delete). Handles task completion and case deletion with toast notifications.

Modal dialog for creating/editing surgery cases with form fields, MRN-based auto-prefill, AI-powered structured text parsing, and checklist management. Tracks user-edited fields to avoid overwriting manual changes.
Main view component that displays a searchable grid of surgery case cards with create/import/export actions and loading/empty states.
Search input component with icon for filtering surgery cases by any field.
Renders a list of checkboxes for surgery case checklist items with toggle functionality.
Provides buttons for exporting cases to CSV and importing cases from CSV with validation, conflict resolution, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: Date input component combining a native date input with a calendar popover picker, handling YYYY-MM-DD format validation and local timezone.
Implements CSV export/import logic for surgery cases, including row parsing, validation, date conversion, and matching against existing cases by MRN.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines CSV column headers and TypeScript types for surgery case CSV import/export structure.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Parses structured text in label:value format (e.g., 'MRN: 12345') to extract case information fields like medical record number, dates, pet/owner names, species, sex, breed, and presenting complaint into a partial CaseFormData object.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Implements case search functionality that filters surgery cases by matching query text against multiple fields including medical record number, pet/owner names, breed, species, sex, dates, notes, and checklist items.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types and constants for case forms, including SPECIES_OPTIONS (canine/feline/other), SEX_OPTIONS (male/female with neutered/spayed variants), and the CaseFormData interface with all case fields.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation and parsing functions for case form fields including required field validators, species/sex parsers that handle various input formats, and date parsing supporting ISO and slash-separated formats.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating actors based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with admin tokens from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: React hook that debounces a changing value with a configurable delay (default 500ms) to reduce frequent updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profile management (get/save), case CRUD operations (get all, get by MRN, create, update, delete) with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a light blue color scheme with white surfaces, blue primary colors, orange for presenting complaints, and various semantic color tokens for UI components.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function 'cn' that combines clsx and tailwind-merge to merge Tailwind CSS class names with proper conflict resolution.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up the root with QueryClient provider and InternetIdentity provider wrapping the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings, typography plugin, container queries, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a fix request for the Date of Birth field not populating from Quick Fill functionality, requiring parser improvements to recognize various DOB labels and date formats.
